name: multisite-improvements
description: A WordPress plugin that explores potential improvements for WordPress Multisite.
author: Syde

scripts.test-php-unit: npx wp-env run tests-cli --env-cwd=wp-content/plugins/multisite-improvements/ composer test:unit
scripts.test-php-integration: npx wp-env run tests-cli --env-cwd=wp-content/plugins/multisite-improvements/ composer test:integration
